content.raw: Cython wasn't a mature project at the time. But it's definitely the right tool for the job now (I'm quite familiar with is and use it pretty often). If done right it will produce code as fast if not faster than what we've written in C. You can also see the output it produces - for the array looping we're doing it will produce pointer arithmetic.
content.html: Cython wasn't a mature project at the time. But it's definitely the right tool for the job now (I'm quite familiar with is and use it pretty often). If done right it will produce code as fast if not faster than what we've written in C. You can also see the output it produces - for the array looping we're doing it will produce pointer arithmetic.
